div.h2: 100% of our students will graduate and be fully prepared for post-secondary education

li.a: Volunteer Clearances - how to obtain/who needs them

div.p: Good Morning, Northeastern! At 10:22 this morning, I received word from the Pennsylvania Department of Education that all Pennsylvania schools MORE...

a.title: Go to comments for A MESSAGE FROM DR. SIDLE

div.p: Beginning on Tuesday, March 17th, we will offer grab-and-go breakfast/lunch free of charge to all NESD students each weekday. Pick up will be at York Haven Elementary, 360 Cassel Road, York Haven and NHS, 300 High Street, Manchester, between the hours of 10:00 – 11:30am. MORE...

a.title: Go to comments for TEMPORARY MEAL PROGRAM

div.p: Our Tech staff will be available Monday and Wednesday and Friday from 10:00 - 11:30 at the 9th grade academy of the high school, accessible from the Hartman Street entrance. MORE...

a.title: Go to comments for CHROMEBOOK HELP/REPAIR INFO

div.p: Northeastern School District recently joined school districts throughout Pennsylvania in the launch of the “Safe2Say Something” (S2SS) anonymous tip reporting system. As a school system, we are committed to creating and sustaining a comprehensive, coordinated effort to improve the overall safety and well-being of our students, educators, and administrators. MORE...

a.title: Go to comments for SAFE2SAY SOMETHING

img.alt: Click here to update your address

div.p: Did you recently relocate within the district? If you haven't already done so, please update your address. You will need to stop by the administration building and provide proof of residency. Please bring your driver's license or State ID and one of the following: Lease/rental agreement, deed, mortgage, and/or settlement papers. This will ensure that all mailings reach you and your student(s). Any questions may be directed to Nancy Zayas at 266-3667 ext 10221

a.title: Go to comments for NEW ADDRESS?

div.p: The goal of Northeastern York School District’s Continuity of Education plan is to provide planned instruction and enrichment and review activities to all students while maintaining personal and supportive relationships with students, parents, staff and our community. We are working to remove barriers in an effort to provide all students with access to the essential content that our professional educators collaboratively determined to be priorities.

a.title: Go to comments for CONTINUITY OF EDUCATION PLAN

div.p: NOW AVAILABLE IN ALL OUR BUILDINGS! Would you like to have the day's menu sent to your phone? Simply sign up for our text alerts and every evening you'll know what's on the menu for the following day. Interested people should send a text to this number 81010. The body of the message should contain the code of the school you wish to subscribe to, including the @ symbol. You can sign up for more than one school. MORE...

a.title: Go to comments for MENU TEXT ALERTS

div.p: Membership in the Northeastern Alumni Association is free and available to all graduates and friends of the Northeastern School District. MORE...

a.title: Go to comments for NORTHEASTERN ALUMNI ASSOCIATION

div.p: We recently posted some additional employment opportunities. Please click here to see the posting and for more information on how to apply.

a.title: Go to comments for EMPLOYMENT OPPORTUNITIES

div.p: SchoolMessenger will allow you to manage the phone numbers and email accounts that you wish to use to be notified as a parent/guardian. MORE...

a.title: Go to comments for CONTROL HOW WE CONTACT YOU

span.strong: Governor Tom Wolf has closed all schools in Pennsylvania for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year

a.title: Go to comments for SCHOOL CLOSURE
